item.description:
Align your own energy systems with RYSE Training 
Receive both RYSE Levels 1 & 2
Saturday, November 10, 9:30 - 3:30 $125
Register: Judy@AHigherBalance.com
This is a special opportunity to raise your vibration, clear your energy systems and gain energetic expansion for your awakening. This is an experiential workshop, providing you with skills to enhance your own energy field at any moment. Bring forth your highest potential, clear unwanted energies and emotional responses, enhance your life force and access your peace and joy. Learn about your chakras, layers of your aura, ida and pingala, inner male and female energies, cellular memories, and much more. If you have already received RYSE, this program will bring you to another level. RYSE levels 3 and 4 workshop will be held at a later time.

group.name: The Salem MA Meditation Meetup Group

item.name: RYSE Training: align your own energy systems & receive 2 RYSE clearings
